QuestData.Title: Proof of Negligence
QuestData.Description:
We can't give up. He must understand what's happening out here! If he won't leave the cave, we'll show him directly.
Anything will do, I'm sure. There's so much going wrong, from the corrupted flora to the antagonized wildlife!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and then show evidence of the Lilac Ramble's damage to Theramus.
